argument.name: filename
argument.description: The fully qualified filename of the image file.

page.description: Used to encode an image filename with an alias. Called by routines that set the image filename
page.discussion: Encodes an image filename with an alias.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = image_filename_encode("C:\Databases\Functions\ahv2.jpg") cs -> filename_decode("ahv2.jpg")
